name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, grid workers in Zhangdian District, Zibo City, Shandong Province urged 18-year-old males in the area to register for military service, saying that it is closely related to future university admission and employment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Subway wreckage from the rear-end collision on the Changping Line of the Beijing Subway

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 15, the Ministry of State Security published an article titled "National Security Agencies Firmly Build a Strong Economic Security Barrier", proposing that we should be vigilant against those with ulterior motives who are badmouthing the Chinese economy. It is reported that this is the third consecutive day that the Ministry of State Security has published articles focusing on economic issues.
On the one hand, experts, scholars and media in the financial sector have been silenced and warned
On the other hand, the national security department intervened in economic issues
This in itself fully illustrates the current severity and crisis of my country's economic problems.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, the ground in the lobby of the No. 1 teaching building of Shandong Pharmaceutical and Food Vocational College collapsed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On December 13, Handan City began to assign blood donation tasks to civil servants, institutional staff, and contract workers. It is reported that similar activities are currently being carried out in various places

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, the Chinese government website posted a microblog: "The State Council wants to hear your voice!" However, the microblog was not allowed to be commented on, which triggered complaints from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Collective discussions on the weather under various social news have become the latest version of the big comment movement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
December 15, Haikou, Hainan. Urban management officers snatched two boxes of lunch boxes from a woman's car, then rode away on an electric bike.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At around 21:31 on December 15, a fire broke out in a private community market in Jishou, Hunan. The fire continued to burn all night, and many merchants' years of hard work were destroyed in the fire.
On December 16, the Jishou Emergency Management Bureau reported that no casualties had been found so far and the fire had been effectively controlled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: But when the media actually reports on the weather, people will criticize the media for not caring about people's livelihood.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, the subway sign at Ningbo Gulou Station suddenly fell off.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, a netizen posted a video saying that he would formally sue the Xinhua Dictionary. He said that the definitions in the dictionary, such as "playing with women", "having a gun on the waist", "children are a burden", and "Japan was called Japan in ancient times", were suspected of violating the "Publishing Management Regulations".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 15, Shanghai. In Shanghai Hongkou Dragon Dream Shopping Mall, a woman in black suddenly chased and beat a mother and daughter. According to passers-by and merchants nearby, the woman in black is suspected to have mental problems. She stays in the mall every day and sometimes steals the goods placed on the counter by merchants.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 15, a parent in Wafangdian, Liaoning Province said that his child was beaten by a teacher with a fist, resulting in damage to the left testicle. The teacher did not tell the child's parents. That night, the child had pain in the lower body and was sent to the doctor for treatment. 
A school staff member said that the teacher involved was 60 years old and was still working at the school. He has now been transferred from the position of head teacher. When asked whether there was surveillance when the child was beaten, he replied, "Yes, he has been transferred by the police station." The staff member said that he did not know the reason why the teacher took action. Because the incident is still under investigation, there is no result for the time being. 
A staff member of the Wafangdian Education Bureau said that the police have intervened and will issue a notice later. 
However, just after the news was exposed, many netizens said in the comment area that they had been physically punished by teachers when they were in school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 15, at Century Bridge in Haikou, Hainan, a woman sat on the bridge guardrail, holding a kitchen knife to her neck and was very emotional. It was reported that it was because of a relationship dispute.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 15, a lawyer named Hou Zhitao released a video saying that he was now being persecuted by the political and legal system in Liupanshui and asked for help from the whole society.
According to his own account, since November 20, 2023, he and his colleagues have been arrested one after another, and he is also facing a search and arrest for the crime of provoking trouble.
The reason is that in the process of enforcing the Yushe Forest Tourism Development Co., Ltd. (a local state-owned enterprise) in Shuicheng District, Liupanshui City, it was found that the executing court had many illegal and even suspected criminal acts, such as illegally unfreezing more than 15 million yuan, a court using two official seals at the same time, and judges abusing police equipment. The court did not correct the mistake, but conspired with the police to use criminal means to arrest them.
Hope to get help. All sectors of society are requested to supervise Liupanshui's behavior through legal channels and rescue them.
